title: Harden
description: Harden Tremayne and Miranda Warren felt nothing but attraction to each other, but both fought against their feelings. She had lost her husband and son in a traffic accident, and still had not surpassed the tragedy. He hated women. He could never forgive his mother that he was an illegitimate son, nor that she had forced him to break off his engagement because that was the reason his young fiancee had killed herself. The battle was going to be hard. Bu if given an opportunity to love, these two solitary hearts could find happiness.
author: Diana Palmer
